title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 361.8 - Review of pool operations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 361.8 - Review of pool operations

State Regulations

Commencing on January 1, 1994, the superintendent shall review the operation of the pooling process described in this Part to determine whether the process is serving the purposes described in section
361.1
of this Part. The carriers participating in the pools shall cooperate with the superintendent in providing information necessary to properly evaluate the process, and the superintendent shall seek and accept additional information from the Technical Advisory Committee. On or before July 1, 1994, the superintendent shall prepare a report that analyzes whether and how well the pooling mechanism is fulfilling its intended purposes, and if appropriate, shall make changes to this Part. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
